thread.section_title: Hotel de Fleurie - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Paris Business Trip
thread.title_full: Paris Business Trip - Review of Hotel de Fleurie, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Dreams-of-Aldeburgh
title: Paris Business Trip
text: Lovely boutique hotel nicely situated in historic part of Paris. Hotel very friendly and room perfectly comfortable. Breakfast is the normal self-service buffet and wider range than some smaller hotels and it's served in the basement "cavern" - quite atmospheric. I'd happily stay here again.
